## what is human factors
- human factors = Ergonomics
- a human-centered design philosophy <-> technology-centered design

## component of human factors
- human: physical, cognitive, group
- task: physical + cognitive + group
- envirnment: working environment, systems

## Goal of human factors
- Reduce errors
- Increase productivity
- Enhance safety
- Enhance comfort
